BLOCK.QRY: UPDATE ACTPAY_SAL_COMP_MST SET NUM_GROUP_ID=?, NUM_CLASS_ID=?,STR_LEAVE_CODE=?, GDT_EFFECTIVE_FRM=TO_DATE(?,'DD-MON-YYYY'),GDT_EFFECTIVE_TO=TO_DATE(?,'DD-MON-YYYY'),GNUM_ISVALID=?,GNUM_SEAT_ID=?,GDT_ENTRY_DATE=?,GSTR_REMARKS=?,NUM_PARAMETER_AMOUNT=?,STR_TYPE=?, GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=? WHERE NUM_SAL_COMP_ID=? AND GNUM_SLNO=? AND STR_PATRAMETER_CODE=? AND GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE ACTPAY_SAL_COMP_MST SET STR_DA_CODE=?,NUM_DA_RATE=?,DT_EFF_GOI=(?,'DD-MON-YYYY'),DT_EFF_GOP=(?,'DD-MON-YYYY'),NUM_ISVALID=?,STR_REMARKS=? WHERE NUM_SLNO=? AND NUM_DA_CODE

UPDATE ACTPAY_SAL_COMP_MST T SET GDT_EFFECTIVE_TO=(TO_DATE(?,'DD-MON-YYYY')-1),T.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=TO_DATE(?,'DD-MON-YYYY'),GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? WHERE T.NUM_SAL_COMP_ID=? AND T.GNUM_SLNO=? AND T.STR_PATRAMETER_CODE=? AND T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE ACTPAY_SAL_COMP_MST T SET T.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=(TO_DATE(?,'DD-MON-YYYY')),T.GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? WHERE T.NUM_SAL_COMP_ID=? AND T.GNUM_SLNO=? AND T.STR_PATRAMETER_CODE=? AND T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE ACTPAY_SAL_COMP_MST T SET T.GNUM_ISVALID=0, GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=TO_DATE(?,'DD-MON-YYYY'),GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? WHERE T.NUM_SAL_COMP_ID=? AND T.GNUM_SLNO=? AND GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
